snippet: The suspect was identified as Naeem Davis, who performed odd jobs for vendors around Times Square and who the police said had no fixed address.
abstract: Naeem Davis is arrested and charged with murder for allegedly pushing Ki-Suk Han into the path of a New York City subway train; victim's friends and relatives struggle to make sense of the crime, and of the reality that no bystanders came forward to try to help Han off the tracks.

byline.contributor: Christopher Maag, Sheelagh McNeill and Michael Schwirtz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The suspect was identified as Naeem Davis, who performed odd jobs for vendors around Times Square and who the police said had no fixed address.

headline.seo: As Victim’s Family Grieves, Suspect Is Arrested in Subway Killing
headline.main: As Victim’s Family Grieves, Suspect Is Charged in Subway Killing
headline.print_headline: As Victim’s Family Grieves, Suspect Is Charged in Subway Killing
